q: Orlando, 3-1, and will meet the Indiana Pacers in the second round, beginning Monday in Indianapolis. "I don't know how you can be any more proud of your team," Courtney Lee said. I told them this was a great opportunity for us to grow up. Allen Iverson 's doing what great players do. He's making other people better and he is taking responsibility and steps up. I feel good that a young team could respond this way. With Allen Iverson leading the way with 26 points, the Sixers built an 18-point lead by the 7:33 mark of the third quarter. singer and actress Jennifer Lopez . Some reports have been lukewarm on whether this will help revive the show's ratings and Jennifer Lopez 's career, both of which have been in decline of late. The LA Times says, With Ellen DeGeneres leaving and Jennifer Lopez reportedly singing on as her replacement, "American Idol has indisputably jumped the shark." the Staples Center. For once, the Nuggets clamped down on defense, but their high-flying offense went AWOL as Carmelo Anthony and Allen Iverson had their worst performance together since the two superstars first teamed up 16 months ago. I was getting to the basket, I just wasn't finishing, Allen Iverson said. "And the same thing happened to` Carmelo Anthony ."
